Package de.variantsync.matching.raqun.similarity

Class WeightMetric

java.lang.Object
de.variantsync.matching.raqun.similarity.WeightMetric
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISimilarityFunction
public class WeightMetric extends Object implements ISimilarityFunction
Re-implementation of the weight metric proposed by Rubin and Chechik, ESEC/FSE 2013 https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/2491411.2491446

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WeightMetric()
    Initialize the WeightMetric without normalization by number of models.
    WeightMetric​(int numberOfModels)
    Initialize the WeightMetric with the number of models which are used for normalization

  • Constructor Details

    • WeightMetric

      public WeightMetric​(int numberOfModels)
      Initialize the WeightMetric with the number of models which are used for normalization
      Parameters:
      numberOfModels - The number of input models that are considered

    • WeightMetric

      public WeightMetric()
      Initialize the WeightMetric without normalization by number of models.

  • Method Details

    • weightForElements

      public static double weightForElements​(Collection<de.variantsync.matching.nwm.domain.Element> elements, int numberOfModels)
      Weight calculation used by the classes implemented by Rubin et al. We changed the method that is called by these classes to this one, because we improved the runtime of the weight calculation and did not want to give RaQuN an unfair advantage here.
      Parameters:
      elements - the elements for which the weight is to be calculated
      numberOfModels - the number of models which is used for normalization (set to 1 for no normalization)
      Returns:
      the weight between 0 and 1

    • getMatchConfidence

      public double getMatchConfidence​(RElement elementA, RElement elementB)
      Description copied from interface: ISimilarityFunction
      Calculate the confidence that two elements should be matched to each other
      Specified by:
      getMatchConfidence in interface ISimilarityFunction
      Parameters:
      elementA - first element
      elementB - second element
      Returns:
      A double value for the confidence. A greater value corresponds to a greater similarity of the two elements, hence, a higher confidence that they should be matched

    • shouldMatch

      public boolean shouldMatch​(Set<RMatch> tuples)
      Description copied from interface: ISimilarityFunction
      Determine whether a set of given tuples should be matched
      Specified by:
      shouldMatch in interface ISimilarityFunction
      Parameters:
      tuples - the tuples that are considered
      Returns:
      true, if the elements of all given tuples should be matched

      Parameters:

      public double getQualityOfMatching​(Set<RMatch> set)
      Calculate the quality of a matching
      Parameters:
      set - The set of elements for which the quality is to be calculated
      Returns:

    • weightForElements

      public double weightForElements​(Collection<RElement> match)
      Calculate the weight for a match of the given elements
      Parameters:
      match - The elements that are to be matched
      Returns:
      The weight of the resulting match
